Name: ClueSponsor
Description: Clue sponsorship (could dictate what subject matter the clue requires knowledge of)

Name: RechargeSponsor
Description: Choose recharging stations according to highest bidder

Name: BuyGems
Description: Users could buy additional code verifications (if they think they interpreted the clue right, but got it wrong, they could buy extras so they can try again)

Name: SkipRecharge
Description: Users could pay to recharge instead of going to recharging spot
